languages.text: -Restores {uip|Heal|dd2e9a6170b448d4b2ec5a7fe0321e65} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. -Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. -Heals one fresh injury, or, if none, one old injury upon a successful Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. -Contains battle stimulators that grant +20 Strength for 3 rounds. -If the character has the Combat Medicae or Field Medic talents, the amount of restored wounds will be increased by the bonuses provided by these talents.
languages.original_text: -Восстанавливает (9 + Медицина применяющего / 4) {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. -Снимает эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}. -Исцеляет одно свежее ранение или, если у персонажа их нет, одно старое ранение при успешной {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверке{/g} Медицины. -Включает боевые стимуляторы, предоставляющие +20 к Силе на 3 раунда. -Если персонаж овладел талантами Полевая медицина или Лечение в бою, то количество восстановленного здоровья будет увеличено на бонус от соответствующего таланта.

traits.locale_text: Works as usual Medikit, and also contains battle stimulators that grant +20 bonus to STR for 3 rounds.

-Restores (9 + Medicae / 4) {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. -Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. -Heals one fresh injury, or, if none, one old injury upon a successful Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. -Contains battle stimulators that grant +20 Strength for 3 rounds. -If the character has the Combat Medicae or Field Medic talents, the amount of restored wounds will be increased by the bonuses provided by these talents.

-Restores {uip|Heal|dd2e9a6170b448d4b2ec5a7fe0321e65} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. -Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. -Heals one fresh injury, or, if none, one old injury upon a successful Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. -Contains battle stimulators that grant +20 Strength for 3 rounds. -If the character has the Combat Medicae or Field Medic talents, the amount of restored wounds will be increased by the bonuses provided by these talents.

-Restores {uip|Heal|dd2e9a6170b448d4b2ec5a7fe0321e65} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. -Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. -Heals one fresh injury, or, if none, one old injury upon a successful Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. -Contains battle stimulators that grant +20 Strength for 3 rounds. -If the character has the Combat Medicae or Field Medic talents, the amount of restored wounds will be increased by the bonuses provided by these talents.

languages.text: -Восстанавливает {uip|Heal|dd2e9a6170b448d4b2ec5a7fe0321e65} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. -Снимает эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}. -Исцеляет одно свежее ранение или, если у персонажа их нет, одно старое ранение при успешной {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверке{/g} Медицины. -Включает боевые стимуляторы, предоставляющие +20 к Силе на 3 раунда. -Если персонаж овладел талантами Полевая медицина или Лечение в бою, то количество восстановленного здоровья будет увеличено на бонус от соответствующего таланта.
languages.original_text: -Restores {uip|Heal|dd2e9a6170b448d4b2ec5a7fe0321e65} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. -Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. -Heals one fresh injury, or, if none, one old injury upon a successful Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. -Contains battle stimulators that grant +20 Strength for 3 rounds. -If the character has the Combat Medicae or Field Medic talents, the amount of restored wounds will be increased by the bonuses provided by these talents.

traits.locale_text: Представляет собой стандартный медкомплект, который также включает боевые стимуляторы, предоставляющие +20 к Силе на 3 раунда.
Представляет собой стандартный медкомплект, который также включает боевые стимуляторы, предоставляющие +20 к Силе на 3 раунда.

-Восстанавливает {uip|Heal|dd2e9a6170b448d4b2ec5a7fe0321e65} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. -Снимает эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}. -Исцеляет одно свежее ранение или, если у персонажа их нет, одно старое ранение при успешной {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверке{/g} Медицины. -Включает боевые стимуляторы, предоставляющие +20 к Силе на 3 раунда. -Если персонаж овладел талантами Полевая медицина или Лечение в бою, то количество восстановленного здоровья будет увеличено на бонус от соответствующего таланта.

languages.text: - 恢复{uip|Heal|dd2e9a6170b448d4b2ec5a7fe0321e65}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。 - 移除{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。 - 治疗一处{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}新伤{/g}，如果该角色没有新伤，则可以尝试进行医疗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，治疗一处旧伤。 - 内含战斗兴奋剂，可以使{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}提高20点，持续三{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。 - 如果该角色拥有战地医疗或野战医疗天赋，恢复的生命值数量也会受到天赋加成影响。
languages.original_text: -Restores (9 + {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} / 4) {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. -Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. -Heals one {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g}, or, if none, one old injury upon a successful Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. -Contains battle stimulators that grant +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. -If the character has the Combat Medicae or Field Medic talents, the amount of restored wounds will be increased by the bonuses provided by these talents.

traits.locale_text: 可以作为标准医疗包使用，内含战斗兴奋剂，可以让{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}提高20点，持续三{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}。

- 恢复{uip|Heal|dd2e9a6170b448d4b2ec5a7fe0321e65}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。 - 移除{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。 - 治疗一处{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}新伤{/g}，如果该角色没有新伤，则可以尝试进行医疗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，治疗一处旧伤。 - 内含战斗兴奋剂，可以使{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}提高20点，持续三{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。 - 如果该角色拥有战地医疗或野战医疗天赋，恢复的生命值数量也会受到天赋加成影响。

languages.text: -Restaura {uip|Heal|dd2e9a6170b448d4b2ec5a7fe0321e65} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}. -Elimina los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}. -Cura una lesión reciente, o, si no la hay, una lesión vieja si se supera una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de Medicae. -Contiene estimulantes de combate que proporcionan +20 a Fuerza durante 3 asaltos. -Si el personaje tiene los talentos Medicae de combate o Medicina de campo, la cantidad de heridas restauradas aumenta según la bonificación que proporcionan sus talentos.
languages.original_text: -Restores {uip|Heal|dd2e9a6170b448d4b2ec5a7fe0321e65} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. -Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. -Heals one fresh injury, or, if none, one old injury upon a successful Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. -Contains battle stimulators that grant +20 Strength for 3 rounds. -If the character has the Combat Medicae or Field Medic talents, the amount of restored wounds will be increased by the bonuses provided by these talents.

traits.locale_text: Funciona como un botiquín estándar y además contiene estimulantes de combate que proporcionan una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} +20 a las {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FUE{/g} durante 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.

-Restaura {uip|Heal|dd2e9a6170b448d4b2ec5a7fe0321e65} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}. -Elimina los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}. -Cura una {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión reciente{/g}, o, si no la hay, una lesión vieja si se supera una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de Medicae. -Contiene estimulantes de combate que proporcionan +20 a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} durante 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. -Si el personaje tiene los talentos Medicae de combate o Medicina de campo, la cantidad de heridas restauradas aumenta según la bonificación que proporcionan sus talentos.

languages.text: -{uip|Heal|dd2e9a6170b448d4b2ec5a7fe0321e65}分の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷耐性{/g}を回復する。 -{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}を取り除く。 -{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}新たな傷{/g}をひとつ治療するか、ない場合はメディケア{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}で成功したときに古傷をひとつ治癒する。 -3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}が20増える戦闘用興奮剤が付いてくる。 -キャラクターが戦闘メディケアか戦場衛生兵の能力を持っている場合、負傷耐性の回復量は、該当する能力のボーナス量に応じて増える。
languages.original_text: -Restores {uip|Heal|dd2e9a6170b448d4b2ec5a7fe0321e65} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. -Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. -Heals one fresh injury, or, if none, one old injury upon a successful Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. -Contains battle stimulators that grant +20 Strength for 3 rounds. -If the character has the Combat Medicae or Field Medic talents, the amount of restored wounds will be increased by the bonuses provided by these talents.

traits.locale_text: 標準的なメディキットとして作用し、さらに戦闘用興奮剤を含む。3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}に+20の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を与える。

-{uip|Heal|dd2e9a6170b448d4b2ec5a7fe0321e65}分の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷耐性{/g}を回復する。 -{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}を取り除く。 -{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}新たな傷{/g}をひとつ治療するか、ない場合はメディケア{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}で成功したときに古傷をひとつ治癒する。 -3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}が20増える戦闘用興奮剤が付いてくる。 -キャラクターが戦闘メディケアか戦場衛生兵の能力を持っている場合、負傷耐性の回復量は、該当する能力のボーナス量に応じて増える。

languages.text: -Heilt {uip|Heal|dd2e9a6170b448d4b2ec5a7fe0321e65} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}. -Entfernt {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}. -Heilt eine {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}frische Verletzung{/g} oder, falls keine vorhanden ist, eine alte Verletzung nach einer erfolgreichen Medicae-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g}. -Enthält Kampfstimulatoren, die 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} gewähren. -Wenn der Charakter über die Talente Gefechts-Medicae oder Gefechtssanitäter verfügt, wird die Anzahl wiederhergestellter Wunden um die Boni erhöht, die durch die entsprechenden Talente gewährt werden.
languages.original_text: -Restores {uip|Heal|dd2e9a6170b448d4b2ec5a7fe0321e65} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. -Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. -Heals one fresh injury, or, if none, one old injury upon a successful Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. -Contains battle stimulators that grant +20 Strength for 3 rounds. -If the character has the Combat Medicae or Field Medic talents, the amount of restored wounds will be increased by the bonuses provided by these talents.

traits.locale_text: Funktioniert als Standard-Medikit und enthält auch Kampfstimulatoren, die +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STÄ{/g} für 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} gewähren.

-Heilt {uip|Heal|dd2e9a6170b448d4b2ec5a7fe0321e65} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}. -Entfernt {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}. -Heilt eine {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}frische Verletzung{/g} oder, falls keine vorhanden ist, eine alte Verletzung nach einer erfolgreichen Medicae-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g}. -Enthält Kampfstimulatoren, die für 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} gewähren. -Wenn der Charakter über die Talente Gefechts-Medicae oder Gefechtssanitäter verfügt, wird die Anzahl wiederhergestellter Wunden um die Boni erhöht, die durch die entsprechenden Talente gewährt werden.

languages.text: -Restitue {uip|Heal|dd2e9a6170b448d4b2ec5a7fe0321e65} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} -Supprime les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} -Soigne une lésion récente ou, s'il n'y en a aucune, une lésion ancienne en cas de réussite d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de Medicae -Contient des stimulateurs de combat qui confèrent +20 de Force pendant 3 rounds -Si le personnage possède les talents Medicae de combat ou Soins de terrain, la quantité de blessures restituée sera augmentée grâce à un bonus octroyé par ces talents.
languages.original_text: -Restores {uip|Heal|dd2e9a6170b448d4b2ec5a7fe0321e65} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. -Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. -Heals one fresh injury, or, if none, one old injury upon a successful Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. -Contains battle stimulators that grant +20 Strength for 3 rounds. -If the character has the Combat Medicae or Field Medic talents, the amount of restored wounds will be increased by the bonuses provided by these talents.

traits.locale_text: Fonctionne comme un médikit classique. Contient également des stimulateurs de combat qui confèrent un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FOR{/g} de +20 pendant 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

-Restitue {uip|Heal|dd2e9a6170b448d4b2ec5a7fe0321e65} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} -Supprime les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} -Soigne une {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésion récente{/g} ou, s'il n'y en a aucune, une lésion ancienne en cas de réussite d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de Medicae -Contient des stimulateurs de combat qui confèrent +20 de{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength} Force{/g} pendant 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} -Si le personnage possède les talents Medicae de Combat ou Médic de Terrain, la quantité de blessures restituée sera augmentée grâce à un bonus octroyé par ces talents.
